362924c6-07ac-4800-b0ff-31e2e08766e1: The tank was shattered from the inside by an unthinkable force.
4dbde49a-df02-4d8f-b05c-9d9fc400d39d: The tank filled with repulsive green liquid contains a mutilated figure. It is difficult to say whether you are looking at a xenos, a mutant, or a machine.
68e242cf-78b2-4e3e-9182-3c935b7c50cb: Revolting biomass, some elements of which can be interpreted as human features, floats in the green liquid.
70eeaeda-1522-407d-83c3-1c5af5a9b7df: Bodies of runaway test subjects. They failed to find a way out and died from hunger and disease.
9dc5e89a-2b88-4ff7-a641-76350a81129a: Disfigured bodies hang all over this old maintenance bay like worthless slabs of meat for which the owner could find no better use.
a895ce55-e258-4e20-afce-9a60609ddc9c: The withered victim's face is forever twisted in a silent scream.
aa842750-0a61-4036-936b-663690b84f9e: Build a bridge out of planks
f1104152-cbf7-40b2-8c32-dc1d949c9dd9: A group of runaway test subjects barricaded the door in a desperate attempt to escape from a terrible fate, but help never came.
